title: Calories in Sirloin Steak

quick_answer.text: One 170 g broiled sirloin steak provides ~350 kcal and ~52 g protein.

faqs.q: How many calories in a sirloin steak?
faqs.a: About 350 kcal for one 170 g lean broiled sirloin steak.

faqs.q: What's the protein in sirloin steak?
faqs.a: Roughly 52 g protein per 170 g serving.
No carbs, fiber, or sugars in plain sirloin steak.
